response.original_title: My House Has a Lot of Windows
response.overview: My Home has a Lot of Windows is a series that follows the adventures of the tiny  Lulu in the infinite building she lives in. In each episode, Lulu will be challenged by her  father, the building's doorman, to help him with some task. While doing her chores,  Lulu will meet a new neighbour and learn how they live their loneliness.
response.title: My House Has a Lot of Windows

titles.title: A Minha Casa Tem Muitas Janelas
